title: Shippû dotô
episode_desc: When two vagrant samurais stumble into waitress Fuu, the three get in trouble with the local magistrate.
show_desc: Fuu, a waitress who works in a teahouse, rescues two master swordsmen, Mugen and Jin, from their execution to help her find the "samurai who smells of sunflowers."
